Text: This is not platinum but only multimedia suite. Size of platinum hd edition is about 1 gb. But yes the cracked dll works good. So thanks for upload.
by the way ritesh7 it is the platinum version it was 386mb packed unpacked aprox 1gb.
thank U so Much for this upload ... nice work

Just to point something out to anybody who installs this. The 3rd point in the instructions say "Install application as TRIAL. (Don't enter any serial)"

Well when you run it, there is already a serial there. DO NOT REMOVE THE SERIAL. I removed it because that is what the 3rd point said and after you remove it - it does not allow you to go to the next step, because you removed the serial. There is no way to install it as a TRIAL. You need that serial so just leave it so you can install it.

The end install size (if you choose everything - Wave Editor, Express, backUp etc) is 1.7GB! You have been warned! You can however pick only the stuff you want during the install stage.
Thanks, worked 100% here! I have to delete the Nero Demo key from Control Centre or i could let it with the Platinum key? I opened Nero Express (the one i'll use a lot) and worked fine as registered.
